quote: A casual gamer who likes to play fighting games, also a professional Twitch streamer.

demographic.primaryResponsibilities: Developing web applications, maintaining codebase, and collaborating with design teams.

needsGoals.needs: A fun way to spend free time
needsGoals.situationsForNeeds: After a long day of work
needsGoals.goals: To have fun with firends and compete
needsGoals.challenges: Does not know the controls of the game
needsGoals.currentSolutions: In game controls and Wiki pages

scenario: Andrew wants a fun way to spend free time after work but is not familiar with the controls of popular fighting games.

usp.benefits: Detailed information on combos and playstyles
usp.solutionsImpact: Teaches combos and helps the user improve at the game
